alert.note: Alert for Harris; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether, southwestern Pike, northwestern Upson and northeastern Harris Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Durand, or near Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Woodbury, Warm Springs, Molena, Sunset Village, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Concord, Raleigh, Atwater, Hilltop, Lifsey Springs, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Stovall, Sunnyside, Durand, Harris City, and Imlac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for west central Georgia.
